title: Easy Palindrome Checker
description: Write a function that checks if a given string is a palindrome. A palindrome is a word, phrase, or sequence of characters that reads the same forward and backward (ignoring spaces and capitalization).
code:
def is_palindrome(s: str) -> bool:
    return s == s[::-1]
tests: assert is_palindrome('A man, a plan, a canal, Panama') == True
